short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get rid of promoted ads and posts with unwanted expressions (e.g. Recommended for you, Expert answers on). Ignore annoying content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Filter your LinkedIn feed. Remove promoted ads and annoying posts with titles like Recommended for you, Expert answers on, Events recommended for you or commented on this. 

The removal is reversible, click the extension's icon to see annoying post. Click again to hide them. 

To control the accuracy of detection, unwanted posts can be highlighted instead of removed. 

For reasonable selectivity, marker text strings, e.g. Promoted, should match entire contents inside an element and matching is case-sensitive.  

Extension is free and open source.
